action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a kitchen with dark wooden cabinets and a light-colored countertop. There is a gas stove on the countertop, and a large window above the sink area that lets in natural light. The kitchen has hardwood flooring, and there is a chandelier hanging from the ceiling. A refrigerator is partially visible on the left side of the image.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a woman helping a young child stand on a skateboard in a living room. The woman is crouched down, holding the child's hands for support. The child is wearing an orange shirt and dark pants, while the woman is wearing a patterned shirt and jeans. The room has a carpeted floor, a chair, a table with a lamp, and other furniture in the background.
